description.value: A code from the SNOMED CT UK coding system for the measurement of head circumferences. Selected from the SNOMED CT UK coding system: - DescendantOrSelfOf 363811000 | Head circumference measure (observable entity) - MINUS   - 1153594009 | Head circumference for age z-score (observable entity) |   - 70751000052109 | Head circumference of biological father (observable entity) |   - 70761000052107 | Head circumference of biological mother (observable entity) |   - DescendantOrSelfOf 170061009 | Child head circumference centile (observable entity) |

value.value: descendantOrSelfOf 363811000 MINUS (1153594009 OR 70751000052109 OR 70761000052107 OR descendantOrSelfOf 170061009)
